entry.message: [info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv, dqc_0011.csv, dqc_0079.csv, dqc_0080.csv, dqc_0081.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2018_concepts.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2019_concepts.csv, dqc_0094.csv, dqc_0129.csv and effective_dates.csv successful. - D:\Temp\tmphba4v3e4\packages\resources.zip

[DQC.US.0150.9876] The disclosure 0000078 - Disclosure - Segments and Related Information - Financial Information by Reportable Segment (Details) includes an inconsistent addition of a dimensional member. The value of the concept us-gaap:RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcludingAssessedTax represents the sum of consolidation item members with a total of 875,402,000. The value of the total should be greater than or equal to the sum of the values of the consolidated items with a value of 901,879,000. The values for the component dimensions are as follows:
Reported consolidated items member srt:ConsolidationItemsAxis=us-gaap:IntersegmentEliminationMember with a value of 26,477,000. Reported consolidated items member srt:ConsolidationItemsAxis=us-gaap:OperatingSegmentsMember with a value of 875,402,000.
The addends are calculated based on the members on the consolidated items linkbase defined for 0000078 - Disclosure - Segments and Related Information - Financial Information by Reportable Segment (Details).
Total Element : us-gaap:RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcludingAssessedTax Total Value : 875,402,000 Total period : 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -3 Rule Element Id:9876 Rule version: 21.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1834622/000183462223000017/hayw-20221231.htm 4

property.name: label
